content: They'd kick back, swap stories, and munch on snacks from all over the galaxy... {A灵光一现}Ugh, now I'm all hungry. When do we eat?
info: 聚餐之前-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A疑惑}Yunguo says she's a cultivator? Hmm... What kinda job is that? Like... a professional mushroom brawler?
info: 聚餐之前-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: In the past,{A大笑} every Sunday the Driftingale Travel Agency would be packed with adventurers who'd returned from all corners of the universe!
info: 聚餐之前-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I exist to resolve crises! Traveling at Mach 3, I'll smash through all obstacles in my way! I am the most... Ooh, look, a flutterbee~?!
info: 聚餐之前-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I'm Esassani, from the Driftingale Travel Agency! {A得意}I'm a tornado tearing through the universe!
info: 聚餐之前-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A害羞挠头}Tee-hee, anyway, our planet has a new arrival, and it's even livelier now! I'm over the moon!
info: 聚餐之前-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II
